faq.Question: How is CUKZZ is different from others?
faq.Answer: Cukzz is a sophisticated Food website where Users can order food in a simple way where delicious dishes are made by home made Cooks in hygienic methods .

faq.Question: How will be my orders delivered ?
faq.Answer: Your orders will be delivered either by Cook or by your Ownself(you have to Pick up yourself).

faq.Question: Will I get a partial refund amount if my order gets canceled / not delivered?
faq.Answer: Yes,You will get refund amount if your order is cancelled/not delivered.

faq.Question: how to track my order if cukzz dispatch the order?
faq.Answer: Go to your User profile . Click My Orders and then Click View Details of your respective order .here you can Track your order by clicking on Track on map

faq.Question: what if User dont pick up the order from cukzz
faq.Answer: If he dont want to Pick up then he should choose Restaurants from Delivery .

faq.Question: Is there any time limit that User should pick up the order from cukzz
faq.Answer: Yes ,there is time limit and you will be informed by Cook through intimation

faq.Question: Can we change the schedule time once the order is placed
Can we change the schedule time once the order is placed
how KYC work? how much time it will take to approve??
faq.Answer: Cook need to register his/her account by giving his KYC details and it will be approved in a appropriate time by Admin.

faq.Question: if i have foodie(user) account ,can i change to Cook account?? how?
faq.Answer: Yes .You can by just mouseovering on a button which is on Top Right position .After that Click Cook Account which  is visible in the dropdown.

faq.Question: Can  I cook & sell, if my kyc is pending?
faq.Answer: No , KYC is necessary for Security reasons .So you should complete KYC before you cook and sell.
